palettes window you can customize tool palettes by dragging and dropping files from windows explorer file explorer objects from a drawing area contextual menus of a tool palette window customize your cui your customizable user interface editor or the customize dialog box each tool palette that is created represents a tab on the tool palettes window the default folder to store tool palettes is percent app data percent that takes you to c colon backslash users backslash your username backslash appdata

quick way of holding on to your standards and or common things you use most often you can put list proteins in there in other words if you have customized list routines you can put those commands in there you can put hatch patterns materials and just about anything you can use in autocad you can put in there you can put just about anything so when we get around to this now we're going to talk about customizing and creating tool palettes so to bring up the tool palette you type in tool palettes in
